item.description:
Your host will be: Karen Yakabowskas


The Mix CT is a really good rock band. Groups like Journey, Rush etc. The Mix will be rockin the Draft House Halloween Style! They'll be dressed as rock-stars! How bout you? Dress Up! Karen will have a table in front of the band with a sign that says Party Express. Karen will be there by 9pm. Karen will be in costume so you will need to look for the sign! Karen called the Draft House --- no cover charge!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Draft House Halloween Party
